## Commercial Dough Dividers and Dough Rounders

The use of commercial dough dividers and dough rounder machines can greatly
increase your production saving you precious time and money. If you aren't
controlling your portions you could be throwing a lot of money away...use a
dough divider machine to scale and divide your dough into perfectly consistent
sizes.  A dough rounder will round your dough into perfect balls enabling you
to quickly send it through a dough sheeter or press.  A combination dough
divider/rounder is a perfect time saver - they will scale, divide and round
your dough all in one shot. From pizza, breads and buns to tortillas, no
matter what type of dough you're preparing, we have the heavy-duty commercial
pizza dough baller machine to get the job done.
